about.resume: Hey, my name is Gustavo. I'm a creative developer and designer living in Brazil with a dream of always helping people, whether it's with a website for their business, helping you understand technology, or simply assisting you in crossing the street.
about.complete_resume: Hey, my name is Gustavo. I'm a creative developer and designer living in Brazil with a dream of always helping people, whether it's with a website for their business, helping you understand technology, or simply assisting you in crossing the street. We are human beings, and we were made to help one another, and that's my passion, helping. I'm a designer who loves bringing life to my creations, be it art or a website. Well, I love developing solutions even for the simplest ideas, and when I'm not creating anything, you can find me cooking, drawing, or simply looking for new things to learn.
